Mozilla M14 Milestone Released

02 Mar 2000

The latest and greatest milestone release of Mozilla is now available for Windows, Linux, and Macintosh.

\n

\nYou can download your favourite flavour from the M14 release-notes page.

The next milestone release will be pushing the project to a beta-version, so it's now more important than ever that you get hold of a full-circle release and report any bugs or crashes that occur.

\n
